heroImage.alt: Find yourself the way to Blame Your Brother.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description:
Blame Your Brother is a boutique design and story - driven animation studio. We focus on 2D classical and 2D/3D digital animation, and illustrative design for commercial, short-format broadcast projects. We're a dedicated group of friends who like to push boundaries, tell stories, and entertain with great care.

Or swing on by and join us for a coffee. We look forward to meeting you.

heroImage.alt: A view of the office of Blame Your Brother.

about.title: This is BYB
about.description:
Blame Your Brother is a boutique design and story - driven animation studio. We focus on 2D classical and 2D/3D digital animation, and illustrative design for commercial, short-format broadcast projects. We're a dedicated group of friends who like to push boundaries, tell stories, and entertain with great care.

We love to bring our clients' stories to life in a fresh, compelling way.

members.name: Darren Donavan
members.title: Partner
members.bio: Darren has worked in the animation industry for 15 years. His award-winning animation career began in the feature animated film world as an FX Artist/Animator at DreamWorks Feature Animation and Universal.
